timeline.bodyText: Seems like now EventObserver is not a necessary part of CopybookService anymore. I think you may implement this interface directly in the CopybookServiceImpl
timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText:
Sorry, not. We still need an observer because CopybookService waits for AnalysisFinishedEvent for sending downloading request to middleware.
I leave EventObserver<DataEvent> as is because in Databus refactoring I plan to get rid of EventObserver.

replies.bodyText:
I can't collapse it. Here I need to manage three cases:
URI is present => read copybook from filesystem
URI is empty and we downloading (DidOpen case) => add copybook for downloading, return stub.
URI is empty and we don't download (DidChange case) => just return stub.
